content.text: is designed to aggregate and summarize billing data from various sources, including coversheets, account billing, and meter billing. It combines data from multiple views and tables to provide a comprehensive summary of billing discrepancies and supplemental charges. The view is structured using a series of

operations to consolidate data from different billing processes and origins, such as coversheet, account billing, and meter billing. The view is primarily used for post-processing analysis, focusing on net discrepancies and supplemental charges.
